job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
We are seeking
Site Reliability Engineers (also accepting Software Engineers/Developers)
for a
full time role
. If you are looking to be part of a team that is excited about building a suite of services that are enterprise scale for one of the top ranked companies, then keep reading! We're looking for top candidates that can contribute to a top tier team.
***FULLY REMOTE***
Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
, other enumerate degree
6+ years of
Java/Python
experience in a professional environment
Strong professional experience in the design and development of pipelines from large databases
3 years experience in extract, cluster or classifying high quality features from unstructured data
Ability to design and implement efficient
algorithms
.
Ability to debug,
optimize code
, an automate routine tasks.
No 3rd party candidates, No H1B, or OPT EAD
Pay/Compensation Package:
$135K-$175K base salary (depending on experience)
$36K-$60K sign on bonus (depending on experience)
Full benefits
Stock options
**IF you are interested and available, please forward your resume to ryan.hughes@comcentric.com or text (970) 773-7230 for immediate consideration.
